modName: More gold in stores and from merchants
summary:
The modification adds more gold the stores and merchants.
Now you can sell them for more at a time :)
descriptionHtml:
Hello;)

 This modification adds to all the shops and merchants larger amounts of gold. (see to screnshot)
 Thanks to this will no longer bother with the sale of captured artifacts :)
 Modification work on all the shops and merchants in all cities and around the world game.
 Modification work properly in combination with perks responsible for investing in the stores.

 How does it look like exactly?

 1 - Vendor Gold Blacksmith Town ----- [originally (500).... now (12000)]
 2 - Misc Vendor Gold --------------------  [originally (750).... now (14000)]
 3 - Vendor Gold Apothecary ------------ [originally (500).... now (5000)]
 4 - Vendor Gold Blacksmith ------------- [originally (1000).. now (10000)]
 5 - Vendor Gold Inn ---------------------- [Original (100)...... now (1500)]
 6 - Vendor Gold Street Vendor --------- [originally (50)...... now (4000)]
 7 - Vendor Gold Spells ------------------- [originally (500)..... now (6000)]
 8 - Vendor Gold Blacksmith Orc -------- [originally (400)..... now (8000)]

 9 - Vendor Gold Fence Stage 01/02/03/04/00 (also have been amended)

REQUIREMENTS - mod is compatible with every version of the game.

MY OTHER MODS...

NEW HD textures for INTERFACE and sounds --- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27980
V740T NEW ErA bottles of potions and poisons -- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35413
New potions and poisons -over 40 new specifics - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35534
NEW era for PLANTS ---------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28212
NEW textures for grass ------------------ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28119
NEW ERA Iron Weapons (realistic retex) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28059
Sounds effects and Music for SKYRIM --- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27447
NEW textures for Caves ------------------ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768
NEW textures for mountains -------------http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27999
author: vito740
